Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: To the best of our knowledge , this is the first reported case of ketoconazole - induced baboon syndrome in the English literature .

Let's think step by step.

1. Ketoconazole
2. Baboon syndrome

These are the two disease entities mentioned in the paragraph. Ketoconazole is an antifungal medication, and baboon syndrome (also known as pityriasis versicolor) is a skin condition caused by an overgrowth of yeast.

Paragraph: To the best of our knowledge , this is the first reported case of ketoconazole - induced baboon syndrome in the English literature .

"Ketoconazole" is the only chemical entity mentioned in the paragraph. It is an antifungal medication used to treat various fungal infections. In this context, it is mentioned as the drug that induced "baboon syndrome" in the reported case.
